p.Music & Theatre majors or other majors w: Music & Theatre majors or other majors with experience/passion for the performing arts, admitted by an interview/portfolio review.

courseSection0.text: Music & Theatre majors or other majors with experience/passion for the performing arts, admitted by an interview/portfolio review.

courseSection0.text0:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
MUL2010 - Enjoyment of Music (3)
MUL2014 - Introduction to Music History and Literature (3)
courseSection0.text1:
Complete the following: 
THE2050 - Theatre Studies in Creative Drama (3)

courseSection1.text0: The internship will be a capstone experience taking an average of ten hours per week. Students are responsible for securing an internship position, which may be paid or unpaid, on- or off-campus, with qualifying performing arts organization. Students will secure approval for internship positions and responsibilities from the department curriculum committee.
courseSection1.text1:
Complete the following: 
ACG2021 - Principles of Financial Accounting (3)
PAD4144 - Nonprofit Organizations (3)
TPA4400 - Theatre Management (3)
MUS4320 - Music Business and Industry (3)
courseSection1.text2:
Internship
Earn at least 3 credits from the following types of courses: 
THE 4941- Internship Credit Hours: 3

courseSection2.text0: Select three courses, one from each of the three different areas.
courseSection2.text1:
Finance & Budgeting
FIN2100 - Personal Finance and Investments (3)
ECO2023 - Principles of Microeconomics (3)
ACG2071 - Principles of Managerial Accounting (3)
courseSection2.text2:
Management
MAR3023 - Marketing (3)
MAN3025 - Management of Organizations (3)
courseSection2.text3:
Nonprofit Sector
PAD4148 - Volunteer Management (3)
PAD4147 - Resource Development in the Nonprofit Sector (3)
PAD3003 - Public Administration in American Society (3)

li.A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all: A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 15 hours in the minor must be e: At least 15 hours in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.

courseSection2.text:
Other Requirements

A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
Grades below "C" (2.0) are not accepted
At least 15 hours in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
